consent.title: Harm Reduction Consent
consent.subtitle: Please read carefully before continuing
consent.section1Text: Reviews-Maker is a platform for creating, sharing, and viewing reviews of cannabis products. This platform is exclusively for adults of legal age in their jurisdiction.
consent.risk2: Impairment of cognitive and motor abilities
consent.risk5: Increased risks for people with psychiatric disorders
consent.risk6: Dangers to the fetus during pregnancy
consent.reco1: Never drive under the influence of cannabis
consent.reco2: Avoid mixing with alcohol or other substances
consent.reco3: Keep products out of reach of children and pets
consent.reco4: Start with low doses and wait for effects before consuming more
consent.reco5: Do not use if pregnant, breastfeeding, or have a history of psychotic disorders
consent.reco6: Consult a healthcare professional with any questions or concerns
consent.section4Text: It is your responsibility to ensure that you comply with the laws in your jurisdiction regarding possession, use, and sharing of cannabis-related information. Some regions strictly prohibit all forms of use.
consent.section5Text: By using Reviews-Maker, you acknowledge that you have read and understood these risks and recommendations. You agree to use the platform responsibly and not in a manner contrary to applicable laws. Reviews-Maker cannot be held responsible for any consequences arising from the use of the platform or the consumption of cannabis products.
